To install and start Ganache, follow these steps:

1. Download Ganache from the following address: https://truffleframework.com/ganache/
2. Install the downloaded package.
3. Open Ganache after installation. It will display an interface showing accounts (default creation of 10 accounts), blocks, transactions, and logs.
4. Click on "Settings" to set parameters such as binding IP and port (set to 8545, as MetaMask will use this port later), number of accounts, gas limit, etc. Click on "restart" for the settings to take effect.
5. Ganache will now be running a private Ethereum network on your local machine, bound to port 8545.
